post.author: Sebultura
post.body:
Hey dudes, I got the game, played with SP & having good fun, but I tried to launch the MP part, create an account & when I'm entering my code, the game doesn't regognize it

Have you got the same problem ? Any workaround (maybe creating the licence file by hand, whatever) ?

Of course I emailed the tech support, but I received a "warning email" back, stating that mine was delayed ! (<== lots of work in Wolf support or bullpoo-poo ???).

post.author: Neurological
post.body: A lot of other ppl are having this problem. You just have to retry more times, I've a similar problem too, I menaged to create the account after some tries, but then I can't see any server on the browser.

post.author: Sebultura
post.body: That's strange, anyway for those having the same issue, I forgot to tell I have the 1.1 patch applied (I didn't tried with the base version).

post.author: aardwolf
post.body: Wait, so, to play online, you have to create an account?? Like Far Cry I think?

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: or like pretty much any other mp game out there today... for all valve games you have to make an account to play SP.

post.author: aardwolf
post.body:
The Happy Friar wrote:
or like pretty much any other mp game out there today... for all valve games you have to make an account to play SP.


I can play cod4 without registering anything. Same for ut3. And of course the older games like quake4. I was so let down when far cry required people to create a ubisoft account just to play online. Ugly trend.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: you still need to enter a CD key & it's checked every time you log in for those games. making an online account stops it from checking the cd key every time, just once.

post.author: =FF=Sturm
post.body:
I needed to ask google how is wolfenstein... and well :O
http://www.lmgtfy.com/?q=Does+Wolfenstein+suck?

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body: Pfft. Google will tell you super metroid sucks if you feed it the right words.

post.author: =FF=Sturm
post.body:
